ppicalc 0.1.0

Reference

Description

ppicalc

The Poverty Probability Index (PPI) is a poverty measurement tool for organizations and businesses with a mission to serve the poor. The PPI is statistically-sound, yet simple to use: the answers to 10 questions about a household’s characteristics and asset ownership are scored and then given these PPI scores, the likelihood that the household is living below the poverty line can be determined using this package. This package depends on country-specific lookup tables developed for the PPI available via the ppitables package.

Calculate PPI score

score_ppi()

Given country-specific survey data with information on the ten questions on which PPI scores are based on, recode the data accordingly and calculate the corresponding PPI score

score_ppi_cohort()

Get a cohort or sample of households' poverty probability score based on their responses to the ten country-specific questions.

Calculate poverty probability

get_ppi()

Get a household's poverty probability based on their Poverty Probability Index (PPI) score. This function uses PPI lookup tables for 60 countries available via the ppitables package.

get_ppi_cohort()

Get a cohort or sample of households' poverty probability based on each household's Poverty Probability Index (PPI) score. This function uses PPI lookup tables for 60 countries available via the ppitables package.

Calculate quintile

quintile_ppi()

Group population by quintiles based on their poverty probability

quintile_ppi_cohort()

Group population by quintiles based on their multiple poverty probabilities

Datasets

scoreCOL2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Colombia

scoreCIV2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Ivory Coast

scoreDOM2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Dominican Republic

scoreGHA2019

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Ghana

scoreKEN2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Kenya

scoreMMR2019

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Myanmar

scoreMOZ2019

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Mozambique

scorePER2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Peru

scorePHL2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Philippines

scoreRWA2019

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Rwanda

scoreSEN2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Senegal

scoreTGO2018

Poverty Probability Index (PPI) scoring table for Togo
